What you want back and what to remove.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Suggestions for Tecmo: What you want back and what to remove.
By kudos on Thursday, May 24, 2007 - 08:07 am:

I have noticed that there are people who got disappointed when their personal favorite got removed from the game. In this thread, please tell the monster you want back and want removed.

Mine

back: color pandoras, hoppers, galis and ghosts
removed: (no offense to the fans of these monsters) garu, antlan, raiden, that roller thing

By Lao Tse on Thursday, June 14, 2007 - 03:55 pm:

Yeah, I hate all those same breeds. I also wish they'd bring back some previous rares just in terms of aesthetics, Muu being at the top of that list >_>

By Summit_trainer on Saturday, June 16, 2007 - 01:21 pm:

The Breed I miss the most, was the Gali, it was so cool as a sub-breed! I also Dearly miss the Worm, and I always Liked Arrowhead, and the great Gaboo.
I could Do without rhino-rollers, Garu, Plant, and the one I PERSONALLY have always wished would go to oblivion... the Mocchi, no offense, I'm sure they are great, but you know...

By Anonymous on Thursday, June 21, 2007 - 02:15 pm:

I so miss Galis and Worms too. Also, I wish they'd retrograde Pixie back to when it could shoot flames and lightning bolts and stuff (SO MUCH BETTER). It seems to me like all the monsters have been moving way more towards POW techs too. What's wrong with INT techs? Personally, Mews could go far away and Ducken could swiftly follow.

By Jake on Saturday, December 15, 2007 - 10:57 pm:

I miss the Monol's.

By Lady Neptune on Sunday, December 16, 2007 - 03:55 am:

Want back: gali, monol, scribble, undine(personally liked undines), Momo/Kato, clown-faded joker from MR2(instead of the more evil looking one, personally the actual JOKER face was more evil to me)
Dislike: rhinorollers, gitans, antlans, garu, mocchi, lesiones, pancho(eh), raiden, mogi, suzurin, maya.

Getting rid of the Gali was kind of annoying because they always seemed to be paired with Joker, and seemed to be fairly staple.
I don't know how you don't like duckens. I like duckens; they have the silliest emotes/techs that are just fun to watch.
I also dislike how Mews turned into a cat that wanted to sing, where I liked before when they were just stuffed animals.

By Capt. Brainpan on Sunday, December 16, 2007 - 07:18 am:

Worm. And Gali. And Momo.

Don't take away any breeds. The more the better!

I feel succinct today.

katos, my first was a pink kato!

failed to learn a skill after 10 Drills. Live with
